title: Ghost to Ghost Halloween 2006 ghost stories - art bell [fixed]
description:
Coast to Coast AM with Art Bell
2006 Hallowe&#039;en Show, 31 Oct 06.
Running time: 163 minutes, 28 seconds
Format: mp3, exported from Audacity 
Recorded in glorious MONO from an AM radio.

Notes:
This show is called "Ghost to Ghost AM" on Hallowe&#039;en night because the host
turns it over to callers with ghost stories.

Art Bell was broadcasting from Manila, Philippines, and so there are occasional dropouts
and delays.

There is also a strange problem between 16:15 and 16:45 where Art may have inadvertently
played a tape in the middle of his Ouija board story.

Commercials, station IDs cut.  Everything else is exactly as it was broadcast.

Share and enjoy.
